title: Cursor won't show up if I'm in a battle
body: I've tried going into the mouse settings and unchecking the mouse trailing, but it continues to not work

replies.body:
So your mouse cursor doesn't show up *at all* in-game? Or only in teamfights your mouse cursor completely disappears?

I recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of League's files in case this is caused by missing game assets.
